name: North Kingdom
description:
Присоединяйтесь к нам в дискорде  

https://discord.gg/8EnArzTg9r

=================

Northern Kingdom is a 3D tower defense game in which you have to defending your castle from siege.

The player needs to restrain hordes of enemies by building a powerful wall to create his army and destroy all enemies!

It is also a classic tower defense game. Destroy the hordes of evil and guard the town hall with surrounded towers to survive! 

My Lord, your castle is under siege!

======== Game Features ========

A sea of explosive impressions in TD

👑HORDES OF ENEMIES who have come to besiege your kingdom and destroy everything in their path!

👑 UPGRADE TOWERS to better guard the kingdom!

👑 GET VARIOUS RESOURCES to build towers

👑 PLAY OFFLINE! The game does not require an internet connection

Build, defend and become the most powerful force of the north kingdom in castle siege games!  Come download the North Kingdom for free right now!
